kong-ee.message: Fixed the OpenResty `ngx.print` chunk encoding duplicate free buffer issue that led to the corruption of chunk-encoded response data.[#10816](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10816)[#10824](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10824)
Fixed the UDP socket leak in `resty.dns.client` caused by frequent DNS queries.[#10691](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10691)
**Rate Limiting Advanced**: Fixed the log flooding issue caused by low `sync_rate` settings.
